body.p:
IN THE NAME AND BY THE AUTHORITY OF
The Commonwealth of Kentucky,
KENTUCKY
UNITED WE STAND DIVIDED WE FALL
THOMAS E. BRAMLETTE,
GOVERNOR OF SAID COMMONWEALTH.
To all whom these Presents shall come, Greeting:

Know Ye, That reposing especial trust and confidence in the integrity, diligence, and abillity of M Towery, I do hereby appoint him AGENT, on the part of this State, to proceed to the Fort of Delaware for the purpose of demanding and receiving from the proper authorities of said Fort Delaware, a Fugitive from Justice from the State of Kentucky, charged with Robbery, and I do hereby authorize and direct the said M Towery to demand and receive the said Fugitive, bring him to this State, and deliver him to the custody of the Jailor of the county of Crittenden.

In Testimony Whereof, I have caused these letters to be made patent and the Seal of the Commonwealth to be hereunto affixed. Done at Frankfort, the 3rd day of November, in the year of our Lord, one thousand eight hundred and 63, and in the 72nd year of the Commonwealth.
